data.title: Raza Jaffrey | Bio, Age, Patrimonio, Relationship, Career – Biografía, Patrimonio, Edad, Peso, Altura, Relaciones
data.meta_description: Raza Jaffrey is an English actor and singer who played Neal Hudson in the CBS TV medical drama Code Black.
data.text:
Raza Jaffrey is an English actor and singer who played Neal Hudson in the CBS TV medical drama Code Black.

What is the Net Worth of Raza Jaffrey? Salary, Earnings

Raza Jaffrey’s projected net worth a partir de 2022 is $1.2 million. He makes a lot of money through his work in films and television.

Where was Raza Jaffrey born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, and Education

His parents were Indian and Liverpool, and he was born on May 28, 1975, in Liverpool, Merseyside, England. His mother is from Liverpool, and his father is from the Indian seaport of Agra.

Hyder Jaffrey and Joan Bradshaw are his parents. From 1986 until 1991, Raza and fellow Spooks actor Rupert Penry-Jones attended Dulwich College. Born and reared in London, Raza spent his childhood there.

After graduating from Dulwich College, he attended Bristol Old Vic Theatre School for acting training and Manchester University for theater.

He then planned to enlist in the Royal Air Force and train to become a pilot. Through his appearances in multiple productions at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe, he boosted his time at university.

The London Vertigo by Brian Friel was performed during the Pendley Open Air Shakespeare Festival. Gregory Doran, the main associate director of the Royal Shakespeare Company, met him during his last semester at Manchester and him an offer of employment.

He was able to apply to Bristol Old Vic Theatre School as a result, and he later made a career in acting.

Quick Facts

Real Name Raza Jaffrey Nick Name Raza Famous As Actor Age 46-years old Birthday 28 May 1975 Birthplace Liverpool, Merseyside, England Zodiac Sign Gemini Ethnicity White Nationality British Religion Christianity Height 6 ft Weight 75 Kg Body Measurements N/A Biceps Size N/A Eye Color Dark Brown Hair Color Black Shoe Size N/A Girlfriend/Dating Spouse Lara Pulver Net Worth $1.2 million Brands N/A Hobbies Acting, Traveling

Is Raza Jaffrey Married? Relationship

In September 2007, Raza Jaffrey wed Miranda Raison, his co-star on Spooks. Still, in November 2009, this couple filed for divorce.

After that, in 2011, he started dating the actress Lara Pulver, with whom he got married on December 27, 2014. Their son, Ozias Jaffrey, was born in February 2017.

How tall is Raza Jaffrey? Weight, Hair Color

Raza Jaffrey, 45, has a height of 6 feet and a width of 6 feet. He weighs seventy-five kg. Raza has stunning black hair and lovely brown eyes. He has an athletic frame and is Asian.

How did Raza Jaffrey start his Professional Career?

Driven by a deep ambition to engage in the acting profession, Razza Jaffrey got active in the theatre sector while attending Manchester University.

Raza made her stage debut at the Pendley Open Air Shakespeare Festival after debuting at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe.

Additionally, he has worked under the tutelage of prominent individuals, including Gregory Doran, the principal associate director of the Royal Shakespeare Company. His interest in the Bristol Old Vic Theatre School grew as a result.

In the television musical drama “Smach,” he also portrayed the character of “Dev Sundaram.” “Elementary” was another drama series that Raza starred in.

This drama was inspired by the Sherlock Holmes books written by Arthur Conan Doyle. After that, he made an appearance in the 2014 spy thriller television series “Homeland” as “Ansar Khan.”

Social media

Raza is one of the most prominent social media influencers, with an estimated 12.7k Instagram followers and 16.4k Twitter followers.

He tweets as @RazaJaffery and has the Instagram name @razajaffery. He has 293 Twitter followers and 42 Instagram followers. Right now, he is not on Facebook.
